item.title: K8s-ceph分布式存储
item.description: 测试环境：Ubuntu20.04 版本 v14.2.22 Nautilus released v15.2.14 Octopus released v16.2.5 Pacific released 最新版本，建议使用此版本？ This is the fifth backport release in the Pacific series. We recommend all Pacific users update to this release. 概念介绍 什么是
